data.client_settings: Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 26655, Version Hash: 830388f8932a64b8afd00254454d2715fa679c33
data.actual_result: Discord voice chat triggers the airpods battery saving feature and all audio turns off.
data.expected_result: You should be able to hear the previous audio as well as the Discord channel audio.
data.short_description: Airpods turn off when joining a voice channel on PC (unlike other bluetooth audio issues)
data.steps_to_repro: - Connect airpods to pc via bluetooth - Use the airpods to play any audio (youtube, twitch, spotify, etc...) - Join a voice channel
